column4: no the kernel also switched from 2.6.38 to 3.0 between natty and oneiric
Exactly my point! Since it was 20th Linux' birthday, Linus just decided to call it 3.0.0 instead of 2.6.40
It is not a major update from the 2.6.X series
I know that, I just think Calinou was indeed talking about the kernel
